title: Development of an online insurance application
description: Together with another developer, I implemented a complete online contract for a new product of a german insurance company within three weeks.
tasks: Development of a frontend based on Angular Dynamic Forms
Development of product-specific Java services for the group-wide OpenShift cluster
Setting up the CI/CD pipelines for the project

title: openVALIDATION
description: I am one of the core developers of the open source project openVALIDATION (docs.openvalidation.io) created at BROCKHAUS AG. It is a software for translating validation rules from natural language into executable Java, C#, JavaScript, or Python source code. BiPRO, a standardization association of the German insurance industry, is expected to include openVALIDATION in the upcoming interface standard "RNext".
tasks: Strategic and technological participation the project
Development of the Python code generator
Development of features and integration tests
Setting up CI/CD pipelines, automation of Maven releases and GitHub administration

title: PoC for AI-based document processing in medical underwriting
description: I developed a prototype AI system for automated document processing at a reinsurance company, consisting of various Python services and a REST API. The range of functions includes image-based document classification and semantic parsing of natural language text for information extraction into a structured target data model.
tasks: Architectural design of convolutional neural networks based on current scientific knowledge
Implementation of a semantic parsing pipeline that combines deep learning and computational linguistic approaches
Development of a feedback learning process for the self-optimization of machine learning models

title: Data-driven MVP test and backend development for Wifi@DB
description: As part of a digitization project of Deutsche Bahn, I developed modern mobile app solutions in the areas of mobility and entertainment as a member of a highly agile development team in lean startup format.
tasks: Conceptualization and development of AI-based, personalized and contextualized content curation
Statistical data analysis for data-driven MVP tests of an iOS app
Support in planning, development and administration of the data analytics infrastructure
General support in the backend and DevOps area

title: UI test automation and IT offshoring for an insurance company
description: In an operating team for the web-based sales system of german insurance company, I supported an offshoring project with the Indian partner company.
tasks: Design of a test and test automation strategy
Knowledge transfer to Indian offshore employees
